See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * $Id: AD_PrintFormatItem_Trg.sql,v 1.3 2003/02/18 03:33:22 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: AD_PrintFormatItem * Description: * - Insert Translation ************************************************************************/ IF(INSERTING) THEN -- Copy INSERT INTO AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl ( AD_PrintFormatItem_ID, AD_Language, AD_Client_ID, AD_Org_ID, IsActive, Created, CreatedBy, Updated, UpdatedBy, PrintName, PrintNameSuffix, IsTranslated ) SELECT :new.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID, AD_Language, :new.AD_Client_ID, :new.AD_Org_ID, :new.IsActive, :new.Created, :new.CreatedBy, :new.Updated, :new.UpdatedBy, :new.PrintName, :new.PrintNameSuffix, 'N' FROM AD_Language WHERE IsActive='Y' AND IsSystemLanguage='Y'; -- Translate if Multi-Lingual UPDATE AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl SET PrintName= ( SELECT e.PrintName FROM AD_Element_Trl e, AD_Column c WHERE e.AD_Language=AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl.AD_Language AND e.AD_Element_ID=c.AD_Element_ID AND c.AD_Column_ID=:new.AD_Column_ID AND AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID=:NEW.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID ) WHERE AD_PrintFormatItem_ID=:new.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_Element_Trl e, AD_Column c WHERE e.AD_Language=AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl.AD_Language AND e.AD_Element_ID=c.AD_Element_ID AND c.AD_Column_ID=:new.AD_Column_ID AND AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID=:NEW.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID AND LENGTH(:new.PrintName) > 0 ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_Client WHERE AD_Client_ID=AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl.AD_Client_ID AND IsMultiLingualDocument='Y' ) ; END IF; -- Optionally Copy Info and Mark for Translation IF(UPDATING) THEN IF(COALESCE(:old.PrintName,'.') <> COALESCE(:new.PrintName,'.') OR COALESCE(:old.PrintNameSuffix,'.') <> COALESCE(:new.PrintNameSuffix,'.')) THEN UPDATE AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl SET IsTranslated='N' WHERE AD_PrintFormatItem_ID=:new.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID; -- Copy if not Multi-Lingual UPDATE AD_PrintFormatItem_Trl SET PrintName=:new.PrintName WHERE AD_PrintFormatItem_ID=:new.AD_PrintFormatItem_ID AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_Client WHERE AD_Client_ID=:new.AD_Client_ID AND IsMultiLingualDocument='N' ) ; END IF; END IF; END AD_PRINTFORMATITEM_TRG
